title: "A big step for flood forecasts in India and Bangladesh"
excerpt: "For several years, the Google Flood Forecasting Initiative has been working with governments to develop systems that predict when and where flooding will occur—and keep people safe and informed. Much of this work is centered on India, where floods are a serious risk for hundreds of millions of people."
